rukus.text: Tomalokaka srsti karaato kathina ne akasa srsti karaa kathina? Teraemi iyaka nirmana karaiche
Teraemi iyara calakhanaka su'ucca karaiche arau subin'yasta karaiche
Arau teraemi iyara raatika karaiche andhakara arau prakasa karaiche purbahnara pohara
Tara pichata, te'om prthiraikhanaka bistrta karaiche
Teraemi tara paraa uliya'iche pani arau trnabhumi
arau parbatasamuhaka teraemi sthapana karaiche
e'ibora tomalokara arau tomalokara gharaciya jantuborara babe jiranopakarana sbaraupa
Arau yidina mahasankata upasthita ha’ba
se'idina manuhe smarana karaiba yito si (bigata dinata) karaiche
arau jahannama prakasa karaa ha’ba drstimana lokasakalara babe
Eteke yiye simalanghana karae
arau prthiraira jiranaka agraadhikara diye
Niscaya jahanname'i ha’ba tara abasasthala
Arau yiye tara pratipalakara sanmukhata thiya ha’balai bhaya karae arau kuprabrttira paraa nijake birata raakhe
niscaya jannate'i ha’ba tara abasasthala
Sihamte tomaka kiyamata samparke prasna karae ye, i ketiya sanghatita ha’ba
se'ito alocana karaara (prakrta) jnana tomara achene
iyara prakrta jnana (kerala) tomara pratipalakara ocarata
yiye iyaka bhaya karae tumi kerala tara babe satarkakarai
Yidina sihamte iyaka dekhiba se'idina sihamtara e'ito dharana haba ye, sihamte prthiraita kerala eta sandhiya athaba eta prabhatatakai bechi samaya arasthana karaa nachila
